attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
reduction of numbers of MPs.Now that most laws are are debated and made in the new united states of europe,There is no need for the 650 members, this should be now reduced to some 25 max,
of good people worthy of thr title right honerable, forthwith. R Dyer.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
